5270.name: Down the path into a dead end
description: You are down the path.  There is no obvious exit in this place, exit the
one back up north.  All around you, you see skeletons.
You see your only way back up.
You see nothing on the floor except skeletons.
Something is strange about these skeletons.  Upon further investigation, these
skeletons appear illusionary.  In fact, through the skeletons, you see a
secret door!!

5241.name: {&Und{*e{&r th{7e {*N{&orth {*E{&ast {*T{7o{&wer
description: You stand at the base of the North East tower.  People pass you by, busy
with work or other things.  High moral is about with the people happy to
have their city back to it's once glorious stature.
Winds howl high above your head in the tower above.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5242.name: {4Th{6e B{^ath H{6ou{4se
description: A hot spring here heats the water for the public bath house.  Several
citizens are relaxing in the large pools and saunas.  A few women are
walking around passing out towels and seeing that peoples needs are met.

5269.name: Small ugly cave
description: You are in a small ugly cave.  More skeletons lie around.  It is obvious
that the owner doesn't want you here.  The exit north is still visible.
Some writings are on this wall.
You see more of the cave.
You see a path leading down into the dark gloom.
This cave along with the valley and dwarf forest is made by Hatchet for any
Merc Mud.
copyright 1992
Something is strange about these skeletons.  Upon further investigation, these
skeletons appear illusionary.

5238.name: {WMai{xn {8S{xt{Wreet{x
description: The road here is freshly rebuilt.  {WMar{8b{Wle B{8r{Wic{8k{Ws{x make up the
intersection, while well kept {ydirt roads{x head in all directions.  Many
people are out and about, doing daily chores, playing and basicly
enjoying life.

5206.name: {7Grey Street{x
description: Citizens of Thalos wander about, some heading to work or home,
others to the Temple of Thalos.  The Temple can be seen a little west
and north of here, a magnificent building, its marble dome is quite a
sight.  To the east is an older looking building with smoke bellowing
from the chimney.  Clanking sounds can be heard from inside.
A small side street leads to the southern half of the city.
The garden path continues around the building.

5210.name: {7Grey Street
description: You are in the common section of the city.  The street here has been
named for the left over marble that has been crushed and laid for the road.
A few citizens are walking about, heading home or to work.
A small clay dwelling sits here.

5275.name: Bend in the dwarf forest
description: You are on a dim trail in the dwarf forest.  Not much light passes through
here.  The trail runs south and west.  The trail west looks much friendlier
than the one leading south.
You see the trail lead west.
You see the dim trail lead south.

5240.name: {7Constr{&u{*ct{7ion W{*o{&rke{7rs Ha{*n{7gout{x
description: The {&Ma{*r{&ble W{*a{&lls{x here are unfinished, due to a handful of
lazy construction workers.  Afew benches are here, as well as several tool
boxes and coolers.  Some dwarven masons are laying about, being lazy.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5295.name: The Doorstep of FatTony
description: You stand inside the apartment above Wanderer's Cafe.  A door
stands to the north, leading into the only apartment in the building.
A large window looks east, outside to the streets of Thalos.  The
stairs lead back down to the Cafe.

5213.name: {7Grey Street
description: This avenue is called Grey Street, so named for the crushed marble
that makes up the road.  The street runs north and south with
buildings along either side.  To the west is a small building
fashioned from wood and stone.
A small sign on the door reads "{2Teeler's Choice{x"

5224.name: {&Und{7e{*r {&th{*e {&Nor{7t{*h {&Wes{7t {&Towe{*r
description: You stand at the base of one of the cities {&Mar{*b{7l{&e{x Watchtowers.  A
magnificant work of art, the marble seems to pulsate and glow under the
superb craftsmanship of the dwarves skill.
Above you looms a tall watchtower.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5232.name: {&Cit{7y {*H{7a{&ll{x
description: The city hall is a fair sized building.  Redone in oak, and the white
marble common throughout the city.  Most of the day to day operations of the
city begin here.  The lord of Thalos also resides here, so it is guarded
quiet well.
A hallway leads to the south wing of the city hall.
A hallway leads to the east wing of the city hall.

5230.name: {7Gain{*e{7r's Arm{*o{7ry {#C{3==={#[{7===========>
description: It is very hot in here.  Piles of swords, axes, and other metal weapons
are pilled up, hanging off the walls, and in stands.  Gainer, a short stocky
man, is in the back furriously hammering out another creation.  His wife
Elisa stands out front waiting to sell her husbands creations.

5293.name: {&Sk{ByWi{&ng{x Exotic Stables{x
description: A large barn, full of stalls and pens.  However the mounts are rare
breeds, and exotic animals.  In some cases even fantastic.  The owner Eben
Skywing is an experianced rider, masterful even.  He can tell you anything
you need to know about any animal that can be mounted

5218.name: {&A B{*a{7c{&k St{*r{&eet
description: The narrow street runs east and west here.  To the east is a small
intersection, and to the west is a watchtower.  A small group of kids
runs by chasing a stray dog, and laughing.  A quaint little pet shop
is to the north.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
A small side street greets you.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5214.name: {WA B{8a{xc{Wk Str{8e{Wet{x
description: You are at the end of a long street leading to the center of the
city.  A long {ydirt road{x runs east and west.  Building walls lie to the
north, while to the south stretches the southern walls of Thalos.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5215.name: {7U{*n{&der t{7h{&e So{*u{7t{&h Wes{*t {&To{7w{&er
description: You stand below the newly rebuilt tower.  Fresh cut {&Whi{*t{&e M{*a{&rb{*l{&e{x stones
make up the tower, a truely impresive sight.  The stones are obviously cut
and laid by dwarven engeniers, no other could do such an intricate job.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5272.name: Dim trail in the dwarf forest
description: You are in a dim trail in the dwarf forest.  Not much light passes through
here.  To the south is a gloomy valley, while to the north the light grows
brighter.
You can actually see the trail north of you!
You can barely see the gloomy valley south of you.

5290.name: {WA B{8a{xc{Wk Str{8e{Wet{x
description: You walk along a long street running along the southern wall of the
city.  A long {ydirt road{x runs east and west.  Building walls lie to the
north, while to the south stretches the southern walls of Thalos.

5244.name: {3Commoner's Home
description: A small house, owned by one of the citizens of Thalos.  The owner is
currently gone, and the fire has died down.  One can hear the children
playing in the park nearby.
A small side street runs past the house.

5247.name: {*S{7o{&uth W{*e{&st Wa{7t{&chto{*w{&er
description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. To the
south the desert stretches to the horizon. No wonder this place stood
for so long.
The city lies below.

5231.name: {&Sout{7h {*W{7i{&ng of the Cit{7y {*H{7a{&ll{x
description: This is the entrance to the Councils office's.  Pedistals and columns
have been restored, and line the room.  A large curved desk is here, for the
clerk of Thalos.  Most people must speak with him before being allowed to
talk to the council members.
The long hallway leads back to the main reception area of the city hall.

5266.name: Darker dwarf forest
description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees.  The gloom caused
by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around.  The trail leads
down into a valley and west.
You see nothing in the gloom west of you.

5245.name: {7Library of Magical Research
description: The room here is rather musty.  Several old tomes, librams, and codexes
have been piled up on shelves, tables, and anything else that will hold
them.  The room itself is round, and lit up by several balls of continual
light.  A great deal of magic was used here to block further castings, and
protect the valuable books.

5286.name: {WO{8l{xd {WTha{8l{Wos Sq{8ua{Wre{x
description: This square marks the oldest part of Old Thalos, aside from the
temple complex which rises just east of here.  The cobblestones are
worn smooth as deep grooves stretch out all about as far as the eye
can see.  Street vendors and shops are set all along the street which
runs north and south, while to the east is the temple and further, the
eastern gates of the city.

5271.name: Valley in the dark dwarf forest
description: You are in a valley in the forest.  To the north is a trail out of this
dark valley.  South is more of this valley.
You see a trail away from this gloomy valley.
You see more of this gloomy valley.

5237.name: {&Librar{7y of {*T{7h{&alos{x
description: Shelves upon shelves of books line the walls.  Tables fill the middle of
the room, also piled up with books.  Several people are sitting at desks,
reading and studying.  An older woman walks about, trying to sort out the
many books, and keep them in order.  A staircase leads up, but on closer
inspection you notice the door is locked, the librarian tells you that it is
reserved for magical reserch.
A small side street winds past the dwelling.
This door leads to the Magical Reserch Wing

5229.name: {5A Str{@a{5nge S{@h{5op
description: This small shop is packed with all kinds of trinkets.  The shelves are
packed with junk from floor to cealing, you wonder how anyone can find
anything here.

5239.name: {&A Sid{7e {*S{&tre{7e{&t
description: The {3dirt road{x runs north and south here.  Further to the north is a
watchtower, while south is an intersection.  A small plaque is here,
dedicated to the city.
You see a watchtower to the north.
Main street runs past here.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5289.name: {WA B{8a{xc{Wk Str{8e{Wet I{xn{Wterse{8c{Wtion{x
description: This spot marks a somewhat busy intersection in the city.  A back
street stretches east and west, while Grey Street runs through the
city north of here.  There are buildings long both streets, as a few
people enter and leave them from time to time.

5253.name: {7Si{&d{*e {&Str{*e{7et
description: The road here leads to a large tower of {&whi{*t{&e ma{*r{&b{*l{&e{x.  A few vendors have
set up stands selling fruit, dried meat, clay pots and anything else they
can sell for a silver piece or two.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5284.name: {&A Hallwa{7y o{*f C{7i{&ty Hall{x
description: This long hallway leads to the offices of the council members.  Its
smooth walls are covered with tapestries and a few Code of Arms.

5256.name: Trail at the end of dwarf forest
description: The trail ends here, with short, dry stumps of trees all around you.
To the west, you can see the ruins of a huge city.  Something about it gives
you an uneasy feeling.  To the east is your way back to home and safety.
You see Thalos!

5285.name: {WMa{8i{xn {WStr{8e{Wet{x
description: The Main Street continues out through the Temple of Thalos just
east of here, toward the oldest walk in the city: Old Thalos Way.
Here there are a few buildings lining the streets, but no entrances
come out on this end, as this street is mainly used to traverse the
city.  The sounds of hagglers can be heard to the west.

5257.name: Trail at the end of dwarf forest
description: A side trail here leads from the dwarf forest.  It is definitely
drier and hotter here.  The trail continues down and to the west, and
to the east, you see the T-intersection.
You see the intersection.

5221.name: {3Wanderer's {xCafe
description: A Large cafe, full of travellers and citizens alike.  Roumers have spread
all over the land of this cafe and its fine food and ale.  Most tables have
been filled, and the bar remains filled 24 hours a day.  A young woman runs
by carrying a platter full of food, almost spilling it on you.  Better hurry
and get a seat.
A small side street runs past the building.

5273.name: Dim trail in the dwarf forest
description: You are in a dim trail in the dwarf forest.  Not much light passes through
here.  The trail runs north and south, and the light seems to come from the
north.  To the east, you see a small path into darkness.
You see the dim trail lead south.
You see the dim trail lead north.
You see the small path.

5209.name: {@Ol{2d {3T{2h{@alo{2s {3P{@a{@rk{x
description: This is the middle of the park.  Larger {2tr{@e{2es{x grow here, providing {8shade{x
to cool off in.  A large {&white gazzebo{x is here, in it sits a bard struming
on his lute, playing a soft sweet song.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5274.name: Dim trail in the dwarf forest
description: You are in a dim trail in the dwarf forest.  Not much light passes through
here.  The trail runs north and south, and the light seems to come from the
north.
You see the dim trail lead north.
You see the dim trail lead south.

5248.name: {&Nor{*t{7h {&Eas{*t {&Watch{*t{7o{&wer
description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you can see a great floating pyramid to the north-east.
Desert sand stretches to the horizon. No wonder this place stood for so
long.
The city lies below.

5205.name: {2Th{5e {%G{&a{@rde{&n {%P{5a{2th
description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the
city.  {5Flo{%w{5ers{x grow on the sides of the path and the lush trees are laden
with fruit.  {2V{@i{2nes {xand {2i{@v{2y{x snake up the sides of the temple, making this
temple truly a blend of nature and man's work of art.
Inside the temple, there is peace
The garden path continues around the building.

5255.name: {&S{7i{&de {*S{&tr{*e{7et
description: This was once a back ally.  Now it is a busy street, people are running
around, going about their daily lives.  To the west is a small sturdy stone
building, the guard house.  To the south the road continues.
You see main street.
You see a sturdy stone building.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5268.name: Small ugly cave
description: You see a small cave.  Skeletons of many types of creatures litter the area.
Obviously, no fox lives here!  The oppression makes you want to leave and
vomit.
You see more of the cave.
You see the exit from here!
Something is strange about these skeletons.  Upon further investigation, these
skeletons appear illusionary.

5282.name: Kalorin's Exotic Animal Shop
description: Kalorin has travelled all over the realm, seeking out strange and new
creatures to tame and bring to the general public.  Several cages are
stacked on top of each other, holding animals one could have a hard time
imagining.

5246.name: {&No{*r{7t{&h We{*s{7t {&Watc{*h{&to{7w{&er
description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. No wonder
this place stood for so long.
The city lies below.

5292.name: {yP{Gark {yW{Galk{x
description: This dirt road marks the entrance to the {GOl{gd {yT{gh{Galo{gs {yP{Gark{x, which
runs just west of here.  There is little else nearby, as the newly
paved road to the east has deterred businesses and patrons from this
part of town.

5265.name: Darker dwarf forest
description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees.  The gloom caused
by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around.  The trail leads
east and west.
You see nothing in the gloom west of you.
You see nothing in the gloom east of you.

5252.name: {&Und{*e{7r {&the S{*o{&uth E{7a{*s{&t Wat{7c{&h T{*o{&wer
description: You stand at the base of a tall watchtower.  Newly designed to protect
the city from any invanders.  The road goes north and west from here.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5264.name: Darker dwarf forest
description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees.  The gloom caused
by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around.  The trail turns east
from the north.
You see nothing in the gloom north of you.
You see nothing in the gloom east of you.

5204.name: {7Grey Street
description: The crushed marble chrunches underfoot.  This section of Grey Street
travels north and south.  A small garden path is off to the west, leading to
the temple.
A side street leads off to the northern half of the city.

5287.name: {WO{8l{xd {WTha{8l{Wos W{xa{Wy{x
description: This is the oldest walk of the city, running near the western wall
and by the many quaint shops that line it.  To the north, the domed
roof of the temple can be seen between buildings, while to the south
the walk ends at the base of one of the watchtowers of Old Thalos.
The walk continues north and south, by street performers and vendors.

5296.name: The Living Room
description: You stand in a very large living room.  The rug is a dark brown
color, almost the color of wood.  A chair sets next to the couch, with
a coffee table infront of it.  Large windows overlook Grey Street, and
a chair sits facing northwards, towards the intersection of Grey and
Main Street.  To the west, you see the kitchen.  To the south is the
front door.

5219.name: {2Teeler's Choice
description: You enter a small shop, the first thing you notice is the smell of
incense, but there is another odor here, like smoke.  Glass counters line
the room holding varrious pipes of brass, chrome, and glass.  Larger water
pipes are held in a locked case behind the counter.  There is a sign on the
wall, read it.
A small side street runs past the building.
We do not sell "bongs", we sell Water pipes.  Under age 18 do not bother
entering.  If your looking for a crack pipe get the fuck out.

5202.name: {&Ma{*i{7n {&Str{*e{&et
description: This is a magnificent street, immaculate all over.  The streets are
filled with people rushing from building to building The whole city is
teeming with activity.  Near the center of town you see a large domed
building, freshly rebuilt with the same {&wh{7i{*t{&e mar{&b{*l{&e{x as much of the city.
The remnants of a store lie this way.
A withered garden path lies this way.

5228.name: {yP{Gark {yW{Galk{x
description: {2Lush Gr{@ee{2nery is al{@l a{2round.{x  Small freshly planted trees are begining
to grow, and the grass is a rich green.  A hand full of people are enjoying
the new park, having picnics and playing games.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5226.name: {7A Cl{8ay {7Dwe{8ll{7ing{x
description: A small humble building, and rather poorly constructed.  The home is
owned a man named Greycloak the Hermit, as he always wears a grey cloak and
keeps to himself.  Many people about town believe him to be crazy, either
that or a powerful mage.
Outside is a small side street.

5223.name: {&O{*l{7d {&Tha{*l{&os W{7a{&y
description: Several empty vendor stands are here, kind of strange, as the rest of the
street is booming with traders, and business.  A single man is muttering to
himself, paying little attention to you as you pass by.
A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5211.name: {7Grey Street
description: This section of town is filled with homes of the cities residents.  Most
are made from wood and stone, but a handfull of the richer ones have copied
the cities white marble, unenchanted however.
A garden path circles around the temple.
Here lies a small stone house with a thatched roof.
An unusually tall dwelling stands looming over you.

5200.name: {&The Gran{7d {*G{7a{&tes of Ol{7d {*T{7halos{x
description: You stand in a magnificent marble archway.  Shining steel gates are swung
open to welcome all onto its streets.  A high White Marble wall circles the
city, strangely if seems to pulsate, glowing with a magical enchantment.
You have entered Old Thalos, once great city, destroyed, and newly rebuilt
to all its former glory.
You see people running about Old Thalos, kept busy and content.
You see a cobblestone trail heading out of the city.
You see Old Thalos returned to its former glory.

5298.name: The Bed Room Of FatTony
description: You stand in the bedroom of FatTony.  The room is pretty much
filled with all diffrent types of furniture.  A large bed sits in the
middle of the room, a desk to one wall, a dresser on the other.  A
small table sits to one side, facing the alley-way to the south.  A
bottle and shot glass sits on the table, the bottle is about half
full.

5258.name: Dwarf forest
description: You see more stunted trees here.  A side trail leads west from here.
To the east, you THINK you see a trail, but you can never be sure.
You see the trail lead back north.
You see the trail branch off.
You can't see into the gloom of this forest.

5262.name: Dwarf forest
description: You see more stunted trees here.  It looks almost as if this place was
cursed by a god to be short and dry.  The trail leads east and west.  It looks
dark toward the east.
You see the lighter forest and the T-intersection west.
You see a darker part of the forest.

5261.name: Dwarf forest
description: You see many stunted trees here.  You don't see any leaves on these barren
trees.  No grass grows on the ground.
You see the trail continue south.
You see the trail continue north.

5297.name: The Kitchen
description: You stand in the kitchen of the apartment.  Large cabinets hang
from the walls, filled with food.  A large iron ice-box sits to one
corner, humming from the mechanics inside it, and as the makou gas
burns.  A large makou gas stove stands a few feet from the ice-box,
and next to that, a sink.

5222.name: {&O{*l{7d {&Tha{*l{&os W{7a{&y
description: All around are shops, small businesses, now thriving under the rebuilt
city.  The {3dirt road{x extends north and south.  To the east is a small shop.
The market place is deserted.
A fine jewelry stand lies in ruin next to you.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5235.name: Small guard house
description: This is the barracks for Old Thalos' cityguards.  It is a small but
sturdy building.  A few bunks are pushed up against one wall, while a
weapons rack is on another.  A post board is listing the daily patrols, and
who gets to take them.
A side street is to the east.

5216.name: {&O{*l{7d {&Tha{*l{&os W{7a{&y
description: The fresh cobblestone walk is worn here.  Many people have traveled this
busy street.  More vendors have set up shops and even a street performer is
juggling for the crowds amusement.
You see the back-side of the market place meat stand.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5212.name: {7Grey Street{x
description: You walk down grey street, the fresh gravel crunching under your feet.
Just to the East is the City Hall of Thalos, day to day operations of the
city begin here.
A small garden path encircles the temple.
This possibly could be the city hall.

5288.name: {WS{xi{Wde {8S{Wtr{8e{xet
description: This newly paved street has been made generous use of by the
citizens of the city.  People stroll it safely within the city walls,
running errands, heading down to the bank or perhaps heading west to
the Old Thalos Way, where the market district of the city has been
established.  The city walls are east of here, running north and south
while just north of here marks the east entrance to the city.

5259.name: Dwarf forest
description: You see more stunted trees here.  It looks almost as if this place was
cursed by a god to be short and dry.  The trail leads north and south.
You see the trail continue north.
You see the trail continue south.

5291.name: {GOl{gd {yT{gh{Galo{gs {yP{Gark{x
description: The path through the park continues here, through quiet, tall trees
that grow silently within the walls of the city.  Many people come
here to relax and enjoy a brief retreat to nature, even if forest
surround this city on most sides.  It is the peace and safety that
they come here for, with the greens being a fortunate accessory to
their security.

5207.name: {3Wanderlust{x
description: Wanderlust: The shop for those who adventure, and travel.  Everything you
need to get up and about the realms.  Walking Sicks, tents, iron rations,
canteens and boxes of other stuff are pilled everywhere.  A dirty elf
wanders out from behind the clutter looking to help you.
The market place continues.

5260.name: Dwarf forest
description: You see more stunted trees here.  It looks almost as if this place was
cursed by a god to be short and dry.  The trail leads north and south.
You see the trail continue north.
You see the trail continue south.

5263.name: Darker dwarf forest
description: You see a more dense foliage in these stunted trees.  The gloom caused
by them is enhanced by a draft coming from all around.  The trail turns south
from the west.
You see the dwarf forest.
You see nothing in the gloom south of you.

5250.name: {&Tem{7ple of T{7h{*a{7l{&os
description: You stand within one of the most holy places in the realm.  This stunning
domed temple houses the city's worshipers en masse.  Long benches line the
aisles and the altar glistens with the {#gold{x and {7platinum{x inlay.  The walls
and roof are all made of {&whit{7e {*m{7a{&rble{x, making this place reflect the sun
well.  The {2gre{@en{2ery{x around the temple itself makes this place a great blend
of {2na{@t{2ure{x and man's works of art.
A side street leads to the northern half of the city.
Main street leads out to the main gate of the city.

5251.name: {*A {&Ba{7c{&k S{*t{&ree{7t
description: The road narrows here, to the east is one of the cities
watchtowers.  To the west the road continues, following the city wall.
A strange shop is to the north, sparking a bit of curiosity.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5233.name: {&Eas{7t {*W{7i{&ng of the Cit{7y {*H{7a{&ll{x
description: This room is the City councils meeting hall.  A large circular table
fills the middle of the room, it is surrounded by several high back chairs,
each carved to the personal tastes of the council member.  Tapestries line
the wall, depicting scens throughout Thalos's history.  On one wall is a
small table, which is kept stocked with a plate of pastries and hot coffee,
reserved for the council members.

5254.name: {&Sou{7t{*h {&Eas{*t {&Watch{*t{&owe{7r
description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers. The view is magnificent
from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains. To the
south the desert stretches to the horizon. No wonder this place stood
for so long.  There is a small plaque on the stones.
The city lies below.
This extension to Thalos, along with the dwarf forest, is made by Hatchet for
any Merc Mud.
copyright 1992

5283.name: Kalorin's Exotic Pet Shop2
description: This is Kalorin's storage room.

5249.name: The First National Bank Of Thalos
description: You stand in the first national bank of Thalos.  The building is
somewhat small, but you see the a bank teller's window to the north,
only one though.  Behind the window you can see the vault, which is
locked up tight.  People are lined up against this one window waiting
to deposit or withdraw money.  The Bank Teller stands infront of you,
waiting....

5280.name: Dark bend in the forest
description: You are in a dark bend in the forest.  To the west, you see the trail
leading back to the dwarven forest, and to the south, you see a dark and
dismal path.
You see the trail back to the Dwarven Forest.
You see the dark path.

5279.name: Bend in the dwarf forest
description: You are on a bend in the trail in the forest.  The trees are stunted, but
not so dry around here.  The trail leads east, and to the south, you see a
waterfall.
You see a beautiful waterfall.
The trail continues east.

5277.name: Trail in the dwarf forest
description: You are in a trail in the dwarf forest.  The trees are stunted and it
looks dry around here.  The trail leads east and west.
The trail continues west.
The trail continues east.

5236.name: {3A Small House
description: This is a small, and simple home.  One room, a table in the middle of
it, and a small bed against the wall.  An old man is cooking a rabit at the
fireplace, he utters a quick story of how this used to be the site of the
old protector of thalos: Gordon the brave.  The man gives a quick smile, a
strange twinkle in his eye.
Main street runs past this ruined home.

5203.name: {xIntersection of {7Grey{x and Main
description: The intersection here is the path to The Temple of Thalos.  Many people
are gathered here, either heading to work, or the temple.  Some people are
waiting near a large fountain, chating about the weather and their newly
rebuilt city.
Grey Street runs south.
Grey Street runs north.
You see the magnificent marble dome, the Temple of Old Thalos
This is the main street leading to the city's entrance

5217.name: {&O{*l{7d {&Tha{*l{&os W{7a{&y
description: A large stand has been set up here with metal hooks and wooden racks in
the background.  Several strips of  meat are drying, some of the exotic
spices catch you nose, inviting you to taste them.
This is a cart full of rotted vegetables and fruits.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5278.name: Trail in the dwarf forest
description: You are in a trail in the dwarf forest.  The trees are stunted and it
looks dry around here.  The trail leads east and west.
The trail continues west.
The trail continues east.

5220.name: {@Aldun's Brew{x
description: Several vials, and bottles are scattered all over the store here.  A
young man stands behind a counter patiently watching a beaker boil, and
adding a pinch of this and that.  He stops only momentaraly, to assist his
customers.
A strong stench emanates from the meat stand next to you.

5276.name: Trail in the dwarf forest
description: You are in a trail in the dwarf forest.  The trees are stunted and it
looks dry around here.  The trail leads east and west.  It looks dimmer to
the east.
The trail continues west.
The trail continues east to the dimmer parts of the forest.

5208.name: {WO{8l{xd {WTha{8l{Wos W{xa{Wy{x
description: You stand at the end of the market square.  Stands and carts line
each side, filled with remnants of fine foods and exquisite goods.  A
road of {Wwhi{8t{We m{8a{Wrb{8l{We{x extends north and south, accentuated the oldest
road within the city.
Tattered carpets and ruined bales of silk sit idly by a run down stand.
The center of the market lies this way.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5243.name: {@Ol{2d {3T{2h{@alo{2s {3P{@a{@rk{x
description: {2Lush {@Gr{2eenery {@i{2s all a{@ro{2und.{x  Small freshly planted trees are begining to
grow, and the grass is a rich green.  A hand full of people are enjoying the
new park, having picnics and playing games.
A side street runs by here.
The wall is covered with strange runes.

5234.name: {WA Sid{xe {8S{Wtre{xe{Wt{x
description: These streets are not nearly as busy as those in the rest of the
city, as newly constructed masonry is still being laid nearby.  No
shops or houses have yet to be established here, and there is a
feeling of abandonment all about.  The side street continues north and
south.  To the north is one of the watchtowers of the city.

5225.name: {^Fen Moxa's Wand and Wizardry Shop
description: This small organized shop is full of magic trinkets.  Shelves stocked
with wands, staves, and talismens line the walls.  A table with several
tubes holding wands sits in the center of the shop.  Fen Moxa sits behind a
glass counter, which holds more of the expensive items.
Next to you is a stand full of ruined clothes and rugs.

5201.name: {&Mai{7n {*S{7t{&reet{x
description: The road here is freshly rebuilt.  {&Mar{*b{&le B{*r{&ic{*k{&s{x make up the
intersection, while well kept {3dirt roads{x head in all directions.  Many
people are out and about, doing daily chores, playing and basicly enjoying
life.
You see kids playing.
You see people enjoying life.
The entrance to the city lies this way.

5227.name: {3A Small House{x
description: A rather quaint home.  It is made from logs, and well lit with windows on
all sides as well as sky lights.  A separate bedroom off the back, and a
kitchen area.  Several herbs and flowers are hung from the cealing drying.
Other varrious items are kept in jars on the wall.
A small side street runs past the house.

5267.name: Valley in the dark dwarf forest
description: You are in a valley in the dark dwarf forest.  Short black grass grows
around you.  Trails lead in all directions.
You see a large mountain on the far side of a canyon.
You see a dark fox hole.

5281.name: {BBy the {^b{6e{^a{&u{^t{6i{^f{6u{^l {&w{^a{6t{^e{&r{^f{6a{&l{6l{x
description: You see a VERY beautiful waterfall here.  It looks almost as if diamonds
are falling down the mountain.  (You reach out and grab and no, it IS only
water.)  It looks so nice here, you feel like taking a nap.  The trail leads
north back the way you came.
You see the trail leading north.

5249.name: The Thalos Bank Teller~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
5249.room_name: The Thalos Bank teller stands here infront of you.

5265.name: Onyx Gates~
description:
Before you stand gates carven of onyx reaching dizzying heights. 
Jagged in appearance, and amazingly strong, it occurs to you that a
breech is next-to-impossible.  
{x
Etched into the black iron in very tiny print is the following
warning:
{x
{RThe Gate has been made very unstable due to excessive vandalism.  It is
poised to fall off its hinges at any moment, and it is strongly advised
that the vandalism stop, or else...
{x
subroutines:
M FIGHT 5267 100~
M FIGHT 5266 10~
M SPEECH 5265 jaluk~
5265.room_name: Before you stand gates carven of onyx reaching dizzying heights.

5200.name: Fen Moxa~
5200.room_name: Fen Moxa is here, keeping things organized.

5201.name: Aldun the Potion Seller~
description:
You see a young man, he wreaks of herbs and maku gas from brewing potions
all his life.
5201.room_name: Aldun is here, brewing up another idea.

5202.name: The Shopkeeper~
description: A dirty little man, he is too busy to do anything but sell junk.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par BCDEFGHIJK
5202.room_name: A strange little man wanders about the shop.

5203.name: Teeler the Head Shop owner~
5203.room_name: Teeler is here, rolling a few smokes.

5204.name: Elisa wife to Gainer~
5204.room_name: Elisa is here, looking rather bored.

5205.name: A Pseudodragon~
description: A small chemeleon-like dragon, dedicated to its loving master.
subroutines:
F aff T
F vul FI
5205.room_name: A small currious dragon circles its master.

5206.name: a Tressym~
description: A short haired grey cat with wings purrs as he gazes at nothing...
5206.room_name: A strange but beautiful, winged cat if flying around here.

5207.name: An Osquip~
subroutines:
F res L
F vul I
5207.room_name: A long, big toothed, rat is hanging around chewing on everything.

5208.name: The stone golem~
description:
It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant
stone creature. He stands here still guarding the city.
5208.room_name: A freshly created Stone Golem is standing watch.

5209.name: a Homonculous~
description:
The Homonculous, ever loyal to his wizard creator, even unto death.  For
it is their only purpose, to serve.
5209.room_name: A small winged creature is here, watching his master.

5210.name: Kalorin the Pet Seller~
5210.room_name: A frail woman is here feeding a strange animal.

5211.name: Rudus the Barkeep~
5211.room_name: The Barkeep is here, seeing to everyones order.

5212.name: Greycloak the Hermit~
description:
A strange old man, he moves about rather slow, clutching something in his
left hand.
5212.room_name: A crusty old man is here, wearing an old {7Grey{x cloak.

5213.name: A Man of Thalos~
5213.room_name: A man of Thalos is here wandering about.

5214.name: A woman of Thalos~
5214.room_name: A young woman of Thalos is wandering about.

5215.name: A young boy~
5215.room_name: A little boy is running about, playing and laughing.

5216.name: A little girl~
5216.room_name: A little girl is here, giggling at you.

5217.name: A Wizard Guard~
5217.room_name: A wizard stands here, keeping the peace.

5218.name: A poor Street Performer~
5218.room_name: A street performer is here trying to entertain people.

5219.name: The Shade of Gordon~
5219.room_name: An old man is here...slowly fading away.

5220.name: Ludanus the Healer~
5220.room_name: A middle aged man is here, preparing some healing herbs.

5221.name: The Wandering Mage~
5221.room_name: A mage is here wandering about.

5222.name: Gainer the Weaponsmith~
subroutines:
M GIVE 5203 ore~
M SPEECH 5202 quest~
M GREET 5201 100~
5222.room_name: Gainer is here crafting another fine blade.

5223.name: a Dwarven Mason~
description:
One of the many workers of Thalos, he has come from the north, from the
Dwarven Kingdom.  He carries a small piece of ore with him for some strange
reason.
5223.room_name: A dwarven mason is here, on a break.

5224.name: An Elite Thalos Guard~
5224.room_name: An Elite Thalos Guard is on duty.

5225.name: Lola, The Secretary~
5225.room_name: A sweet, young woman is here, waiting to help you.

5226.name: the librarian~
description:
She is old, short and frail.  She wears long socks that come up to
her knees, and a long dress that falls to her ankles amidst wide,
unfasionable leather shoes.  She wears thick, round spectacles that
sit perched at the end of her crooked nose, next to a large black
mole.  Her hair is short, blue, and overly curly, as if she had curled
it with a smithing poker herself.  She has a tendency to hold her
finger to her lips, closing them with a hiss.  It is incredibly
annoying.
subroutines:
M GIVE 5268 13720~
M SPEECH 5269 recipes~
M SPEECH 5270 secrets~
M SPEECH 5271 spells~
5226.room_name: A short, frail woman is here, watching over the library.
5226.keywords: short frail woman old thalos librarian~

5227.name: Eben Skywing~
5227.room_name: Eben Skywing is tending to a warhorse.

5228.name: A Light Warhorse~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par BGHI
5228.room_name: A well trained war horse is here, waiting for its master.

5229.name: A Heavy Warhorse~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par BGHI
5229.room_name: A well trained heavily armored warhorse is here.

5230.name: A Giant Lizard~
5230.room_name: A large green lizard is here, with a saddle on it's back.

5231.name: A White Pegesus~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par BGHI
5231.room_name: A white horse with glistening wings, waits for its master.

5232.name: A Tamed Griffon~
5232.room_name: A tamed griffon is laying in the sun.

5268.name: Descent Guard~
description:
This guard, while alone, appears more than capable to handle any intrudes
into the compound.  A large black cloak conceals his body, except for two
sword hilts protruding from within the folds of cloth.  Occasionally he
draws the weapons and performs a swift attack routine through the air,
ensuring that his skills are honed to perfection.
5268.room_name: A Guard of the {!De{1sce{xnt is here, poised to strike from the {&sh{*a{&d{*o{&ws{x

5287.name: Jertik the Wanderlust~
5287.room_name: A dirty little elf keeps the shop, neat.
